lyrics: The leaves turn gold, a gentle sigh
Seasons shift beneath the sky
A fading dream on whispered breeze
Of summer sun and swaying trees
The world transforms, a silent call
Where autumn's touch embraces all
With every step, a memory wanes
A bittersweet song of changing strains
Footprints fade on frosted ground
Lost echoes in the swirling sound
A path unknown, where shadows creep
Secrets in the silence sleep
Through swirling mists, a journey starts
The heart remembers, a distant flame
A whispered hope, a forgotten name
Where broken pieces mend our hearts
Through swirling mists, a journey starts
Where broken pieces mend our hearts
Cold rain falls on a weary face
Each tear blends in this lonely space
The weight of sorrow finds its hold
The weight of sorrow finds its hold
A story left, a tale untold
But in the darkness, a flicker gleams
A whispered wish, resilient dreams
The heart beats on, a steady guide
Where strength within begins to rise
